text: Mera bijli bill bahut zyada aaya hai is mahine.
The electricity bill amount is unexpected, charge zyada lag raha hai.
Bill mein extra fee add hui hai, koi explanation nahi.
Payment karne mein issues ho rahe hain, online portal error.
Tariff structure clear nahi hai, nahi samajh aa raha rate kya hai.
Bijli bill late fee lag gayi even though time pe pay kiya tha.
I got overcharged this month, bill higher than consumption justify karo.
Monthly bill amount always fluctuate karta hai bina warning ke.
Bill calculation contradictory hai, units consumption match nahi karti.
Bijli baar baar kat rahi hai, outage ka koi info nahi milta.
Power cut hone ka schedule reliable nahi hai.
Voltage fluctuation bahut zyada ho raha hai ghar pe.
Even a small storm me bhi poora area blackout ho jaata hai.
Frequent outages se kaam ruk jaata hai, please improve.
Kahaan se outage updates milenge, koi app nahi bata rahi.
Supply reliability bahut poor hai, trust nahi hota.
Bijli at 220V hona chahiye par yahan 180-200V se upar nahi jaati.
Sudden interruption se appliances kharab ho rahe hain.
Meter reading ke liye technician kab aayega?
Repair crew response time bahut slow hai.
Service request register to ho gaya but koi call nahi aayi.
Meter thik nahi hua, technician wapas nahi aaya.
